org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network

Interface ZigBeeEndpoint

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ColorDimmableLight, Device, DimmableLight, IAS_Zone, IASAncillaryControlEquipment, IASControlAndIndicatingEquipment, LevelControlSwitch, LightSensor, MainsPowerOutlet, OccupancySensor, OnOffLight, OnOffLightSwitch, OnOffOutput, OnOffSwitch, Pump, SimpleSensor, TemperatureSensor, ThermostatControl
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColorDimmableLightDevice, DeviceBase, DimmableLightDevice, GenericDevice, IAS_Warning_Device, IAS_ZoneDevice, IASAncillaryControlEquipmentDevice, IASControlAndIndicatingEquipmentDevice, LevelControlSwitchDevice, LightSensorDevice, MainsPowerOutletDevice, OccupancySensorDevice, OnOffLightDevice, OnOffLightSwitchDevice, OnOffOutputDevice, OnOffSwitchDevice, PumpDevice, SimpleSensorDevice, TemperatureSensorDevice, ThermostatControlDevice, ZigBeeEndpointImpl

    public interface ZigBeeEndpoint
    This interface represent a ZigBee Endpoint.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MATCH_CLUSTER_ID
      Constant for the ZigBee device match scale to add when a device match with the ProfileId for each of the cluster matching.
      static int MATCH_DEVICE_ID
      Constant for the ZigBee device match scale, indicating a match with the ProfileId and the DeviceId.
      static int MATCH_PROFILE_ID
      Constant for the ZigBee device match scale, indicating a match with the ProfileId.

    • Field Detail

      • MATCH_PROFILE_ID

        static final int MATCH_PROFILE_ID
        Constant for the ZigBee device match scale, indicating a match with the ProfileId. Value is 1024.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MATCH_CLUSTER_ID

        static final int MATCH_CLUSTER_ID
        Constant for the ZigBee device match scale to add when a device match with the ProfileId for each of the cluster matching. Value is 1.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MATCH_DEVICE_ID

        static final int MATCH_DEVICE_ID
        Constant for the ZigBee device match scale, indicating a match with the ProfileId and the DeviceId. Value is 4096.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getNetworkAddress

        int getNetworkAddress()
        Returns:
        int representing the current network address linked to the node

      • getIeeeAddress

        java.lang.String getIeeeAddress()
        Returns:
        a String representing the IEEEAddress of the node

      • getEndPointAddress

        short getEndPointAddress()
        Returns:
        Address of the EndPoint represented by this object, value ranges from 1 to 240.

      • getProfileId

        int getProfileId()
        Returns:
        the profile Id implemented by this EndPoint

      • getDeviceTypeId

        int getDeviceTypeId()
        Returns:
        the device id implemented by this EndPoint

      • getNode

        ZigBeeNode getNode()
        Returns:
        the ZigBeeNode containing this endpoint
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • getEndpointId

        java.lang.String getEndpointId()
        Returns:
        a String the represent an URI of endpoint.
        Since:
        0.5.0

      • getDeviceVersion

        short getDeviceVersion()
        Returns:
        the device version implemented by this endpoint

      • getInputClusters

        int[] getInputClusters()
        Returns:
        the list of Input Cluster identifies implemented by this EndPoint

      • providesInputCluster

        boolean providesInputCluster(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - the Cluster identifier
        Returns:
        true if and only if the EnpPoint implements the given Cluster id
        as Input Cluster

      • getOutputClusters

        int[] getOutputClusters()
        Returns:
        the list of Output Cluster identifies implemented by this EndPoint

      • providesOutputCluster

        boolean providesOutputCluster(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - the Cluster identifier
        Returns:
        true if and only if the EnpPoint implements the given Cluster id
        as Output Cluster

      • invoke

        ClusterMessage invoke(ClusterMessage input)
                      throws ZigBeeNetworkManagerException
        Invoke the given ClusterMessage (which is supposed to part of the Input Cluster) of this EndPoint,
        and wait for the a response from.
        Parameters:
        input - the ClusterMessage containing the id of the Cluster to invoke and the cluster message
        Returns:
        the ClusterMessage representing the response received after that the Cluster answer to
        the request.
        Throws:
        ZigBeeNetworkManagerException

      • send

        void send(ClusterMessage input)
          throws ZigBeeNetworkManagerException
        Send the given ClusterMessage (which is supposed to be Input Cluster) to this EndPoint,
        on the contrary than the invoke(ClusterMessage) this method doesn't wait for nor requires
        an answer from the EndPoint-
        Parameters:
        input - the ClusterMessage containing the id of the Cluster to send to the cluster message
        Throws:
        ZigBeeNetworkManagerException

      • bindTo

        boolean bindTo(ZigBeeEndpoint endpoint,
             int clusterId)
               throws ZigBeeNetworkManagerException
        This method modify the Binding Table of physical endpoint by adding the following entry: 
         this.getNode().getIeeeAddress(), this.getDeviceTypeId(), clusterId, endpoint.getNode().getIeeeAddress(), endpoint.getDeviceTypeId()
        Parameters:
        endpoint - ZigBeeEndpoint the endpoint that we want to bound to
        clusterId - the clusterId that we want to bound to
        Returns:
        true if and only if the operation succeeded
        Throws:
        ZigBeeNetworkManagerException
        Since:
        0.5.0

      • unbindFrom

        boolean unbindFrom(ZigBeeEndpoint endpoint,
                 int clusterId)
                   throws ZigBeeNetworkManagerException
        This method modify the Binding Table of physical device by removing the entry if exists 
         this.getNode().getIeeeAddress(), this.getDeviceTypeId(), clusterId, device.getNode().getIeeeAddress(), device.getDeviceTypeId()
        Parameters:
        endpoint - ZigBeeEndpoint the device that we want to bound to
        clusterId - the clusterId that we want to unbound from
        Returns:
        true if and only if the operation succeeded
        Throws:
        ZigBeeNetworkManagerException
        Since:
        0.5.0

        Throws:

      • addClusterListener

        boolean addClusterListener(ClusterListener listener)
        Add a ClusterListener to this EndPoint. The same instance of a ClusterListener will
        registered only once.
        Parameters:
        listener - the ClusterListener to register
        Returns:
        true if and only if the ClusterListener has been registered

      • removeClusterListener

        boolean removeClusterListener(ClusterListener listener)
        Remove a ClusterListener to this EndPoint.
        Parameters:
        listener - the ClusterListener to unregister
        Returns:
        true if and only if the ClusterListener has been unregistered
